subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Sam Hornish Jr. said he would pass on the Indianapolis 500. His plans were the subject of much speculation after the owner Roger Penske entered a No. 77 car in the Indy 500 and did not say who would drive it.
snippet: Sam Hornish Jr. said he would pass on the Indianapolis 500. His plans were the subject of much speculation after the owner Roger Penske entered a No. 77 car in the Indy 500 and did not say who would drive it.
